alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Spalding (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 11:09PM EST until February 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16 affecting Fayette and Spalding Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Griffin Hwy. 16...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands...fields and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 16 or Newnan Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM EST Saturday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 12.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
